title: What are some interesting topic ideas for a rhetorical analysis essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: I define “rhetorical analysis” as the study of the sentence structure and word choice in a piece of work Are the sentences long or short? Are they simple, or are there many compound/complex sentences? Is the vocabulary simple or more complex? What rhetorical devices does the writer use? Is all this on-target for the writer, audience, and purpose?
